sentences.sContent: To balance the books, he raised some taxes, notably VAT, but three-quarters of the savings will come from spending cuts.
sentences.sContent_eng: To balance the books, he raised some taxes, notably VAT, but three-quarters of the savings will come from spending cuts.
sentences.sCn: 为了平衡账簿，他增加了部分税收，特别是增值税，但是四分之三的节余将来自削减开支。

phrases.pCn: abbr. 增值税发票（Value Added Tax Invoice）
